title: How to Make a Ghetto Cake

steps.headline: Spray the pan with cooking spray.
Empty cake mix completely into pan.
Mix a 12 oz.
steps.description: soda into the pan with the cake mix.

steps.headline: Place pan with mixture into microwave.
Microwave on high for exactly ten full minutes in a 1000W microwave.
Let the cake sit a minute.
Remove the cake from the microwave.
Test with knife.
steps.description: There shouldn't be any mixture sticking to the knife.

steps.headline: Let cool, cut pieces and enjoy!

text: Spray the pan with cooking spray.  Empty cake mix completely into pan.  Mix a 12 oz. soda into the pan with the cake mix. Mix thoroughly! There should be no lumps. Place pan with mixture into microwave.  Microwave on high for exactly ten full minutes in a 1000W microwave.  Let the cake sit a minute.  Remove the cake from the microwave.  Test with knife. There shouldn't be any mixture sticking to the knife. Let cool, cut pieces and enjoy!
